name: xaraya/modules
description: Collection of modules to extend Xaraya's functionality

suggest.xaraya/cachemanager: Manage the output cache system of Xaraya
suggest.xaraya/changelog: Keep track of changes to module items
suggest.xaraya/comments: Allows users to post comments on items
suggest.xaraya/crispbb: Feature rich forum module for Xaraya
suggest.xaraya/html: Configure the allowed HTML or your site
suggest.xaraya/images: Handles image manipulation with resizing/cropping/scaling/rotating and various filters
suggest.xaraya/keywords: Assign keywords to module items (taxonomy) and look up items by keyword
suggest.xaraya/library: Library of books from Calibre or elsewhere
suggest.xaraya/logconfig: Module for Configuration the Logging System
suggest.xaraya/mime: Hook based module that returns the content-type of a given file.
suggest.xaraya/publications: Manage publications on a Xaraya site
suggest.xaraya/pubsub: Allow users to subscribe to updates to events
suggest.xaraya/realms: A module for managing multi-realm sites
suggest.xaraya/release: Registration and Release information for themes and modules
suggest.xaraya/scheduler: Schedule Xaraya jobs at certain times of the day/week/month (cron)
suggest.xaraya/scraper: A module for scraping HTML pages
suggest.xaraya/sitemapper: Module to create a site map
suggest.xaraya/sitetools: Set of tools for site and database maintenance
suggest.xaraya/skeleton: Skeleton for a new Xaraya module
suggest.xaraya/twig: Use Twig template engine with Xaraya
suggest.xaraya/workflow: Workflow Module based on the Galaxia Workflow Engine
suggest.xaraya/wurfl: A wrapper module for the WURFL API
suggest.xaraya/xarayatesting: Module with QA checks and unit tests
